update
set FHEAD = #{FHEAD}, HEAD_PONE = #{HEAD_PONE}, OVERHAUL_PERSON = #{OVERHAUL_PERSON}, OVERHAUL_PERSON_PHONE = #{OVERHAUL_PERSON_PHONE}, URGENT_CONTACT = #{URGENT_CONTACT}, URGENT_CONTACT_PHONE = #{URGENT_CONTACT_PHONE}, MANUFACTOR_CONTACT = #{MANUFACTOR_CONTACT}, MANUFACTOR_CONTACT_PHONE = #{MANUFACTOR_CONTACT_PHONE}, ENTER_DATE = #{ENTER_DATE}, RME_WHETHER = #{RME_WHETHER}, RME_DAY = #{RME_DAY}, RPIN_WHETHER = #{RPIN_WHETHER}, SIN_DAY = #{SIN_DAY}, FEXTEND1 = #{FEXTEND1}, FEXTEND2 = #{FEXTEND2}, FEXTEND3 = #{FEXTEND3}, FEXTEND4 = #{FEXTEND4}, FEXTEND5 = #{FEXTEND5}, FCREATOR = #{FCREATOR}, CREATE_TIME = #{CREATE_TIME}, EQM_BASE_ID = #{EQM_BASE_ID}, STRUCTURAL_FEATURES = #{STRUCTURAL_FEATURES}, BASE_PARAMETER = #{BASE_PARAMETER}, WORKING_PRINCIPLE = #{WORKING_PRINCIPLE}, CONTROL_SYSTEM = #{CONTROL_SYSTEM}, INVERTER_SERVO_DRIVE = #{INVERTER_SERVO_DRIVE}, MOTOR_TYPE_POWER = #{MOTOR_TYPE_POWER} where EQM_BASE_PARAMETER_ID = #{EQM_BASE_PARAMETER_ID}
